title: Universal Says On-Demand Film Strategy Has Increased Audience
description: The studio let viewers rent or buy movies earlier for a higher price. This made more than $1 billion in less than three years, with nearly no decrease in box-office sales.

title: Senators Accuse TikTok of Misleading Congress on U.S. User Data
description: Two senators sent a letter to TikTok’s C.E.O. on Tuesday with questions about how user data may be stored and accessed in China following new reports in May.

title: The AI Boom Is Pulling Tech Entrepreneurs Back to San Francisco
description: Tech entrepreneurs who left the Bay Area during the pandemic say they can’t afford to miss out on the funding, hackathons and networking of the artificial intelligence frenzy.

title: Crypto Firms Start Looking Abroad as U.S. Cracks Down
description: As the country becomes one of the world’s strictest crypto regulators, companies are exploring plans to expand internationally and possibly leave entirely.
